params._poolSalt: Identifier of the pool of the data broadcast
params._secondsAgos: Set of time periods to consult the pool with

sendObservations(address,uint32,bytes32,.details: Permisionless, input parameters are validated to ensure being correct

params._observationsData: Array of tuples representing broadcast dataset
params._poolSalt: Identifier of the pool of the data broadcast

params._pendingGovernor: Address of the proposed new governor

params._poolSalt: The id of both the oracle and the pool

returns.tickCumulative: Pool's tickCumulative at last observed timestamp

strategy.details: The strategy should define when and with which timestamps the pool should be read
strategy.return: Address of the contract allowed to trigger an oracle update

returns._0: Address of the contract allowed to trigger an oracle update

InvalidSecondsAgos().notice: Throws if set of secondsAgos is invalid to update the oracle

OnlyGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-governor user tries to call a OnlyGovernor function

OnlyPendingGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-pending-governor user tries to call a OnlyPendingGovernor function

OnlyStrategy().notice: Throws if a contract other than Strategy calls an update

UnknownHash().notice: Throws if an unknown dataset is being broadcast

ZeroAddress().notice: Throws if a variable is assigned to the zero address

DataBroadcast(bytes32,uint24,uint32,addr.notice: Emitted when a data batch is broadcast

PendingGovernorAccepted(address).notice: Emitted when a new governor is set

PendingGovernorSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new pending governor is set

PoolObserved(bytes32,uint24,(uint32,int2.notice: Emitted when a data batch is observed

StrategySet(address).notice: Emitted when the Strategy contract is set

acceptPendingGovernor().notice: Allows a proposed governor to accept the governance

fetchObservations(bytes32,uint32[]).notice: Triggers an update of the oracle state

lastPoolStateObserved(bytes32).notice: Tracks the last observed pool state by salt

sendObservations(address,uint32,bytes32,.notice: Broadcasts a validated set of datapoints to a bridge adapter

setPendingGovernor(address).notice: Allows a governor to propose a new governor

userdoc.notice: Queries UniV3Pools, stores history proofs on chain, handles data broadcast
